about.description: I have 1+ years of experience as a software engineer. I got professional training on ASP.NET Core with Angular and EF Core from PencilBox Training Institute and also successfully complete my internship period at Enlight Solutions.
I am very passionate about software development and related fields. I am interested to learn in-depth knowledge in topics rather than floating on and jumping around.

I love to learn with a team, work with a team, it's nice to collaborate with humans, if other species could understand software development, I surely would collaborate with them and learn from them obviously in their unique way.
